Package de.gnwi.mfsim.gui.chart

Class XyChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.mfsim.gui.chart.XyChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChartInterface
    public class XyChart
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChartInterface
    A chart with xy-data. The data and look of the chart can be manipulated.
    Author:
    Jan-Mathis Hein

      Increases the number of points that are initialy discarded by one and updates the chart accordingly

      Sets whether there is an accumulative XYSeries array of the main chart data or not and creates it

      Sets whether the last point of the chart is marked or not and updates the chart accordingly
      void setHasReducedStatistics​(boolean aHasReducedStatistics)
      Sets whether the statistics will change according to the displayed data or not

      • getStatisticsString

        public java.lang.String getStatisticsString​(int anIndex)
        If this chart has changing statistics return the statistics of this chart but only data up to a certain point (anIndex) is considered. Else return the statistics for the main chart data.
        Parameters:
        anIndex - Index of the point up to which data is considered
        Returns:
        The statistics of this chart but only data up to a certain point (anIndex) is considered if the chart has changing statistics. Else return the statistics for the main chart data

      • setHasReducedStatistics

        public void setHasReducedStatistics​(boolean aHasReducedStatistics)
        Sets whether the statistics will change according to the displayed data or not
        Parameters:
        aHasReducedStatistics - True: The statistics will change, false: The statistics stay the same

      • setHasAccumulativeChartDataArray

        public void setHasAccumulativeChartDataArray​(boolean aHasAccumulativeDataArrays)
        Sets whether there is an accumulative XYSeries array of the main chart data or not and creates it
        Parameters:
        aHasAccumulativeDataArrays - True: This chart has an accumulative XYSeries array of the main chart data, false: It has not

      • setHasLastPointMarked

        public void setHasLastPointMarked​(boolean aHasLastPointMarked)
        Sets whether the last point of the chart is marked or not and updates the chart accordingly
        Parameters:
        aHasLastPointMarked - True: The chart's last point is marked, false: It is not

      • setHasReducedTrendLine

        public void setHasReducedTrendLine​(boolean aHasReducedTrendLine)
        Sets whether the trend line will change according to the displayed data or not
        Parameters:
        aHasReducedTrendLine - True: The trend line will change, false: The trend line will stay the same

      • setHasTrendLine

        public void setHasTrendLine​(boolean aHasTrendLine)
        Sets whether the chart has a trend line or not and updates the chart accordingly
        Parameters:
        aHasTrendLine - True: This chart has a trend line, false: It has not

      • setIsFillColorWhite

        public void setIsFillColorWhite​(boolean anIsFillColorWhite)
        Sets whether the fill color of the shapes is white or black
        Parameters:
        anIsFillColorWhite - True: The fill color is white, false: The fill color is black. If the last point is marked its fill color is the opposite

      • setIsInverted

        public void setIsInverted​(boolean anIsInverted)
        Sets wether the chart's colors are inverted or not
        Parameters:
        anIsInverted - True: The colors of the chart are inverted, false: They are not

      • setIsOutlinePaintWhite

        public void setIsOutlinePaintWhite​(boolean anIsOutlinePaintWhite)
        Sets whether the outline paint of all shapes is white or black
        Parameters:
        anIsOutlinePaintWhite - True: The outline paint is white, false: The outline paint is black

      • setIsShapePaint

        public void setIsShapePaint​(boolean anIsShapePaint)
        Sets whether data points in the chart are painted as shapes or not
        Parameters:
        anIsShapePaint - True: The data points are painted as shapes, false: The data points are not painted as shapes

      • setIsThickLines

        public void setIsThickLines​(boolean anIsThickLines)
        Sets whether the chart has thick or thin lines
        Parameters:
        anIsThickLines - True: The chart has thick lines, false: It has thin lines
